radiographic_examinations.findings: No gallstones, mild gallbladder wall edema, gallbladder not concerning in appearance, no pericholecystic fluid, no biliary dilatation (common duct measures 0.3 cm), liver unremarkable, no ascites, spleen normal (measuring 10.9 cm).
No pancreatic abnormality, mild gallbladder wall thickening.
